Leland follows the story of Leland P. Fitzgerald (Ryan Gosling), a disaffected teenager who has apparently murdered a severely retarded peer, the brother of his boss… but that’s only how it looks at first glance. Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” and “Adult.”  While there are liberal uses of dream sequences, there’s not much extra here. This film doesn’t dig deep into Kenji’s beliefs or helps us understand better why he wrote what he did.
